item.title: This Nuclear Fusion Startup Just Raised $863 Million From Nvidia and Other Investors
item.description: Big tech is backing this advanced nuclear technology in search of new sources of power to fuel AI and data centers.

item.title: Applebee’s Didn’t Promote Her, so She Bought the Company
item.description: Julia Stewart revealed the origin story of Dine Brands Global on a podcast, highlighting that the business world can be small.

item.title: These 17 Cleveland Companies Are Growing Fast—and Hiring a Lot of People
item.description: Seventeen fast-growing companies from the Cleveland metro area made this year’s Inc. 5000—and added more than 1,000 new jobs in just three years.
